EmailTemplate.name: Send Email Notification on Case Resolved JP_en
EmailTemplate.subject: 【Status of your enquiry】from DAZN
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Case.Account}, Thank you very much for your inquiry. Thank you for your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} about {!Case.Type}. We hope your question was satisfactorily answered by our Customer Support team, and you're now using DAZN without any issues. If so, we would appreciate it if you can reply to this email so that we can close your inquiry ID:{!Case.CaseNumber} about {!Case.Type}. If you are still having problems, there's some helpful information here https://stag.dazn.com/help. Or please contact Customer Support directly https://stag.dazn.com/contactus who are happy to help. Ensuring that you enjoy DAZN is our priority.
